seed_prompts.critique_prompt: Review this solution step by step. Identify any errors in mathematical reasoning, calculations, or logic. Be specific about what went wrong.
seed_prompts.refinement_prompt: Based on the critique above, provide a corrected step-by-step solution. End your final answer with \boxed{answer}.

evolved_prompts.critique_prompt: Review this solution step by step. Identify any errors in mathematical reasoning, calculations, or logic. Be specific about what went wrong.
evolved_prompts.refinement_prompt: Based on the critique above, provide a corrected step-by-step solution. End your final answer with \boxed{answer}.
